body:
Thank you to all the people who cared and supported me, about me and my snakes, if you don't remember, it was a post I made on the old forums. Man, no wonder people call me the reptile whisperer :)


here's what happened, you see, today I was done with my snake being scared of me. So just a few minutes ago, I came to my snake, she seemed very scared at first, I gently coaxed her into my loving arms, nope didn't work, I tried again but this time, I whispered to myself about memories. Sure enough it didn't work. I was about to give up I was slowly walking away when I heard some tapping noises, I turned around and found that my snake was tapping her snout on the glass of her cage! I opened her tank and she came running for me, once she was in my arms, she was my baby again...

I thank you all so much!

cheers! :D
26763
